ValidationRule.description: This rule forces reps to provide a valid first name, last name, and company name before trying to convert.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $User.Alias <> "autocln", $User.ProfileId <> "00e30000001kms9", CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "PGi"), $User.Override_Validation_Rules__c = False, ISPICKVAL(Status, "Qualifying"), OR( ISBLANK(FirstName), LastName = "[not provided]", FirstName = "[not provided]", Company = "[not provided]" ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The First Name, Last Name, and/or Company Name values cannot be [not provided] or blank when the Lead Status is set to Qualifying. Please update before saving the record.
